title: Peer e Kamil

title: Bakht
description: A novel that explores the struggles and triumphs of a young girl named Bakht.

title: Sulphite
description: A thriller about a series of mysterious incidents related to the element sulphite.

title: Mushaf
description: A story about spirituality and the hidden meanings of the Quran.

description: A tragic tale of love and sacrifice set against the backdrop of political power.

description: A story about the different perspectives of two contrasting characters and their journey to find common ground.

description: A thought-provoking novel about self-discovery and spiritual awakening.

description: A tale of emotional turmoil and personal transformation.
author: Umera Ahmed
